channel.title: 360 Nation
channel.description: Xbox News, reviews, and updates! Anything related to the xbox, we like to talk about! (and other systems too!) Proud member of the VGevo.com network! And FuriousGamer.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: 360 Nation
channel.itunes:author: randum
channel.itunes:summary: Xbox News, reviews, and updates! Anything related to the xbox, we like to talk about! (and other systems too!) Proud member of the VGevo.com network! And FuriousGamer.com

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-6: Catching up!
item.description: This week Justin and Alex talk about catching up, a few racing games, and maybe chipping away at their backlog! Thanks for listening and remember to tell a friend and leave some feedback! email@360nationpodcast.com
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin and Alex talk about catching up, a few racing games, and maybe chipping away at their backlog! Thanks for listening and remember to tell a friend and leave some feedback! email@360nationpodcast.com

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-5: A little Slow
item.description: This week Justin and Alex cover a little news, a new trivia game Alex played and not too much else going on this week! Thanks for listening, remember to leave us some feedback at email@360nationpodcast.com and remember to post on Retroids.com!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin and Alex cover a little news, a new trivia game Alex played and not too much else going on this week! Thanks for listening, remember to leave us some feedback at email@360nationpodcast.com and remember to post on Retroids.com!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-4: New Xbox!?
item.description: This week Justin and Alex tackle the rumors surrounding the Xbox future console, and some new releases and some DLC titles you might have missed. Thanks for listening! email@360nationpodcast.com for the question for next week!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin and Alex tackle the rumors surrounding the Xbox future console, and some new releases and some DLC titles you might have missed. Thanks for listening! email@360nationpodcast.com for the question for next week!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-3: Dark demo and Sequels!
item.description: This week Justin and Alex talk about the new XBL demos, and the top ten selling games of 2011. Thanks for listening, send your feedback/comments to email@360nationpodcast.com and remember to follow us on twitter! @360Nation
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin and Alex talk about the new XBL demos, and the top ten selling games of 2011. Thanks for listening, send your feedback/comments to email@360nationpodcast.com and remember to follow us on twitter! @360Nation

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-2: Dungeon Gamers
item.description: This week Justin and Alex are joined by Chris aka LAAG from Retroids.com to talk about their latest gaming adventures, some new XBL demos, and a big slew of upcoming titles coming in February on XBL. Enjoy, and thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin and Alex are joined by Chris aka LAAG from Retroids.com to talk about their latest gaming adventures, some new XBL demos, and a big slew of upcoming titles coming in February on XBL. Enjoy, and thanks for listening!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 3-1: Happy New Year!
item.description: New year,new games, and a new official co-host! Alex and Justin talk about whats been keeping them busy, AND their personal picks for their games of the year - also the worst game of the year! Thanks for listening, and keep gaming! email@360nationpodcast.com for any feedback
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: New year,new games, and a new official co-host! Alex and Justin talk about whats been keeping them busy, AND their personal picks for their games of the year - also the worst game of the year! Thanks for listening, and keep gaming! email@360nationpodcast.com for any feedback

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 2-32: Update and news!
item.description: Lots happening, Justin finished his big test and now he can focus on the podcast! New episodes and content incoming! This episode, a little news for you!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: Lots happening, Justin finished his big test and now he can focus on the podcast! New episodes and content incoming! This episode, a little news for you!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 2-30: Forza and Gears of war!
item.description: This week Justin is joined by Chris to talk about the new Forza and the latest Gears of War! Also an updated release schedule! REMEMBER EXTRA LIFE IS THIS WEEKEND! Check RETROIDS.com for more info!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin is joined by Chris to talk about the new Forza and the latest Gears of War! Also an updated release schedule! REMEMBER EXTRA LIFE IS THIS WEEKEND! Check RETROIDS.com for more info!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 2-29: Update!!
item.description: Quick update before some major releases hit this fall, what you can expect from the upcoming shows!
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: Quick update before some major releases hit this fall, what you can expect from the upcoming shows!

item.title: 360 Nation Episode 2-28: The beginning of releases!
item.description: This week Justin is joined by Greg from Retroids.com to talk about a movie game he finished, a little hype for Gears of War 3 next week, and Justin finishes Deus Ex. Thanks for listening and remember to send your feedback to email@360nationpodcast.com
item.dc:creator: randum
item.itunes:summary: This week Justin is joined by Greg from Retroids.com to talk about a movie game he finished, a little hype for Gears of War 3 next week, and Justin finishes Deus Ex. Thanks for listening and remember to send your feedback to email@360nationpodcast.com
